official_title: Concurrent resolution to express the support of Congress on participation in the Symposium on Management and Utilization of Remote Sensing Data to be held in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, October 29 to November 2, 1973.

summary.text: Expresses the support of Congress on participation in the Symposium on Management and Utilization of Remote Sensing Data to be held in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, October 29 to November 2, 1973.
